Generated Narrative: ValueSet eHDSIBodyStructureLocationWithExceptions

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Exceptional Value
  • Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Body Structure Location Qualifier

name: EHDSIBodyStructureLocationWithExceptions
title: eHDSI Body Structure Location Qualifier with exceptions
description:
This Value Set is used for the body structure location qualifier. Concepts modifying the anatomic location.
It also includes exceptional values.
